en.title: **B.Tech** in Computer Science & Engineering
en.text:
Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree with a strong GPA of 9.35. Actively involved in hands-on projects, research, and internships focused on:

  • Cybersecurity
  • Cloud Security
  • Web Application Development

Working on a capstone project based on AI-powered Zero Trust Security Model for API Threat Detection in the Cloud Environment.

en.title: **Diploma** in Computer Engineering
en.text: Gained strong practical and theoretical knowledge in computer science fundamentals, programming, and networking. Successfully completed real-time academic projects.

en.title: **10th Standard**
en.text: Completed my secondary education with a strong academic foundation in Mathematics and Science. Developed early interest in computing and logical thinking during this phase.
